name: Port Toddy

ingredients.name: ruby port i like fonseca or taylor fladgate
-inch-wide ribbon of orange peel studded with 3-5 cloves.

instructions: In a mug or heatproof glass, stir the port, sugar and juices together with the cinnamon stick, leaving the cinnamon in the vessel. Add hot water to fill, and garnish with the clove-studded orange peel.
